items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t need to apologize. He did nothing wrong.
Tom bought a camera at a store not too far from here.
Tom said that he was planning on getting there early.
Tom said that was the first time he tried to do that.
I can\'t help wondering if Tom will get here on time.
Tom asked Mary how many people had come to her party.
Tom asked Mary if she really wanted to do that today.
Tom asked Mary what time she wanted him to come over.
Tom asked if Mary and I wanted to go skiing with him.
Tom asked me to help him put new frets on his guitar.
